title: Tiny Dancer! Baby girl dresses up as ELTON JOHN for Halloween
text:
A toddler dresses up as Elton John and plays a pink piano in adorable footage posted online by her parents.

Benni Rea Bottiaux, who is just 11 months old, happily bashes away at the keys while wearing a feather-trimmed suit and huge sunglasses.

Her mother Destiny, from Biloxi, Mississippi, calls her name and she looks up giggling at the camera.

Benni Rea (left), who is just 11 months old, happily bashes away at the keys while wearing a feather-trimmed suit and huge sunglasses and looking like Elton John (right)

But the youngest quickly focuses, looking down at the keys to continue her sweet symphony.

The tiny dancer has always been interested in music, Mrs Bottiaux said, and often watches music videos with her father Deven.

She even 'plays' the guitar, as well as her little pink piano, and sings at church, they added.

Her mother Destiny Bottiaux, from Biloxi, Mississippi, calls her name and she looks up giggling at the camera. But the youngest quickly focuses, looking down at the keys to continue her sweet symphony

Benni's favourite song is suitably Bennie And The Jets by Elton John, which inspired her first Halloween costume.

Mrs Bottiaux made the outfit herself, and Benni seems chuffed with it - based on this cute video of her.

The mother posted the footage on Facebook with the caption: 'Shes got furry ugg boots, a linen suit, belongs in a magazine, ohhhhhhhhh B-B-B-Benni is the best.'

Benni's (left and right) favourite song is suitably Bennie And The Jets by Elton John, which inspired her first Halloween costume

She added: 'Shes a star. LOVES her theatrics too. Runs in the family.'

Mr Bottiaux said: 'Seriously though... My baby girl was born to be a star.'

On why his daughter loves Elton, he added: 'Well honestly it's simply because her name is Benni, so my wife and I always sing Bennie and the Jets to her, and she just eats it up!

'Naturally the next step was for my wife to go all out and dress her up as Elton for her first Halloween.'
description: Benni Rea, who is just 11 months old and from Biloxi, Mississippi, happily bashes away at the keys while wearing a feather-trimmed suit and huge sunglasses.
